    • Method Detail

      • callWagon

        public boolean callWagon(String valueFile,
                String distanceTableFile,
                String destinationFile)
        Call the wagon program
        Parameters:
        valueFile - the file containing the values of the units
        distanceTableFile - the distance tables for the units
        destinationFile - the file to dump the tree to
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure

      • callWagon

        public boolean callWagon(String valueFile,
                String distanceTableFile,
                String destinationFile,
                int balance,
                int stop)
        Call the wagon program This method allows to set the stop and balance values
        Parameters:
        valueFile - the file containing the values of the units
        distanceTableFile - the distance tables for the units
        destinationFile - the file to dump the tree to
        balance - if balance = 0 stop is used; else if number of indices at node divided by balance is greater than stop it is used as stop
        stop - minimum number of indices in leaf
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure

      • callWagon

        public boolean callWagon(String arguments)
        Call the wagon program with the given argument line. This method is for those who know what they are doing.
        Parameters:
        arguments - all arguments to wagon in one string
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure
